content.webTitle: Saint Newlove to march back in

fields.headline: Saint Newlove to march back in
fields.bodyText: Paul Newlove, who feared he had played his last game when he snapped an achilles tendon at Hull last June, has been named in the St Helens squad for Saturday's Challenge Cup tie at Warrington. St Helens are likely to name the 17 who won at Oldham in the fourth round. The Saints coach Ian Millward said: "Paul's doing all the training with us now. He will appear shortly and all the indications are that he'll get back to what he was before."
